text:
Поздрави,

Елена Ковачки

Ръководител „Администрация и Бек Офис“

Отдел „Търговия с природен газ“

Моб: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com <http://www.tibiel.com> 

ТИБИЕЛ ЕООД



 



 

From: Loukopoulou Georgia <GLoukopoulou@eurobank.gr> 
Sent: Thursday, July 4, 2024 3:26 PM
To: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com>
Cc: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com>; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com>; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com>; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr>
Subject: FW: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 06/2024

 

 

 

 

Dear Elena,

 

Please find attached the requested statements for May and June 2024 (01-6-30/06) & as of today.

 

With Kind regards,

Georgia

 

 

From: Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> > 
Sent: Thursday, July 4, 2024 10:20 AM
To: Kazara Aikaterini <akazara@eurobank.gr <mailto:akazara@eurobank.gr> >; Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr <mailto:anpalamidas@eurobank.gr> >; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:GCM@eurobank.gr> >; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr <mailto:SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr> >
Subject: RE: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 06/2024

 

	CAUTION: This is an EXTERNAL Email. Please DO NOT open attachments, click links or reply, unless you have verified the sender and know the content is safe. 

	ΠΡΟΣΟΧΗ: Το Email προέρχεται από ΕΞΩΤΕΡΙΚΗ ΠΗΓΗ. Παρακαλούμε ΜΗΝ απαντήσετε, MHN ανοίξετε attachments & MHN ακολουθήσετε links, πριν βεβαιωθείτε οτι ο αποστολέας και το περιεχόμενο είναι ασφαλή. 

 

Dear Aikaterini Kazara,

 

Could you please send us a bank statement

 

Kindly Regards,

Elena Kovachki

Administration & Back office Manager

Natural Gas Trading Department

Mob: +359 893 659 834

www.tibiel.com/en <http://www.tibiel.com/en> 

Tibiel L.t.d.





From: Kazara Aikaterini <akazara@eurobank.gr <mailto:akazara@eurobank.gr> > 
Sent: Wednesday, July 3, 2024 10:03 AM
To: Nikolai Hadzhiysky <n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com <mailto:n.hadzhiysky@tibiel.com> >; Backoffice <Backoffice@tibiel.com <mailto:Backoffice@tibiel.com> >; Aneta Ivanova <a.ivanova@tibiel.com <mailto:a.ivanova@tibiel.com> >; Athanasios Karantzis <akarantzis@tibiel.com <mailto:akarantzis@tibiel.com> >
Cc: Palamidas Andreas <anpalamidas@eurobank.gr <mailto:anpalamidas@eurobank.gr> >; GCM (General Clearing Member) <GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:GCM@eurobank.gr> >; Sales and Relationship Management <SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr <mailto:SalesandRelationshipManagement@eurobank.gr> >
Subject: TIBIEL Ltd Νatural Gas Invoice - Clearing & Sub-Acc. Fees GAS - 06/2024

 

Dear all,

 

Attached you will find the invoice issued by Eurobank SA regarding:

 

The fees for the maintenance of Sub-Accounts at the Natural Gas Platform in June 2024.

 

We are at your disposal for any further clarification.

 

 

Kind regards,

 

Aikaterini Kazara

SENIOR SECURITIES & FUNDS ADMINISTRATOR 

General Member Clearing Services 

Group Investment Products Operations 

 



 

EUROBANK S.A.

Panagouli & Siniosoglou Str. (Building E)

GR 142 34 Nea Ionia, Athens Greece

Tel

Email  

 

: (+30) 21 4406 3242  

: GCM@eurobank.gr <mailto:gcm@eurobank.gr>           

 

 

 

 

 

 

* Think before you print.
